TEXT.TITLE: SEACOAST SAVINGS <SSBA> INITIAL OFFER UNDERWAY
TEXT.BODY: Underwriter Merrill Lynch and Co Inc <MER> said an initial public offering of 1,216,700 common shares of Seacoast Savings Bank of New Hampshire is underway at 10 dlrs per share. Reuter
